Virtual Private Servers (VPS)

VPS Starter Package - $4.95/month (with coupon, just $4.85)
Use Coupon Code vps_starter

The Starter VPS (Virtual Private Server) - is the next logical step up from a shared platform. It's ideal for stand- alone services, whether you need a private proxy, small email server, VPN endpoint or DNS server.

Order Now!

VPS Starter PLUS Package - NEW $9.95/month (with coupon, just $9.45)
Use Coupon Code vps_starter_plus

The Starter Plus VPS - is a Virtual Private Server package ideally suited for small to moderately dynamic websites.

If you need to scale up your applications or services, Starter Plus VPS is the right choice. Repositories, FTP Servers and databases perform well with this VPS package.

We use CPIs Adjustable Rail QuadraRack (ARQR) and ServerRack (ARSR) - which are similar to CPIs Adjustable QuadraRack and ServerRack except that the new adjustable rail version allows you to adjust the depth of the rear equipment mounting rails after the rack is installed.

Four-post racks provide a sturdy, cost-effective solution for supporting rack-mount network, computer server and data storage equipment in data centers, computer equipment rooms and other IT facilities. Self-squaring assembly with welded front and rear frames reduces assembly time. Integrated grounding and bonding features include a Two Mounting Hole Ground Terminal Block for easy attachment to the Telecommunications Grounding Busbar.
